author: 'Abdu'l-Baha
source_text: ولکنّهم یا الهی تراهم بعینک الّتی لا تنام نقضوا المیثاق و نکصوا علی الأعقاب و نکثوا العهد بکلّ بغض و شقاق و قاموا علی النّفاق
translation: Yet now Thou seest them, O Lord, my God! with Thine eye that sleepeth not, how that they have broken Thy Covenant and turned their backs thereon, how with hate and rebelliousness they have erred from Thy Testament and have arisen intent upon malice.
